name: Zombie War Outbreak: Survival Shooter FPS
name_original: Zombie War Outbreak: Survival Shooter FPS
description:
As one of the last remaining soldiers of your elite team, you must save humanity from the upcoming zombie apocalypse. A survival game that will test your wits against hoards of incoming zombies!

STORY / SETTING:
It is the year 2020, a cure that was created to end all illness's has instead transformed the test subjects into zombies. The disease then quickly spread from one human to another leaving only one third of the human population alive.

The world had then united into one banner to fight off those that were affected by the deadly disease and save the last remaining remnants of humanity. You as one of the last remaining soldiers of your elite team must defeat the zombies that threaten the lives of the current living human populace.

Arm yourself with various weapons, watch your stamina and health meters, and go all out in this 3D FPS shooting game!

FEATURES:
⭐ Over 100+ Missions across various battlefields
⭐ Purchase & Loot over 60+ Weapons in this Zombie Shooter!
⭐ Various weapons such as a sniper rifle, baseball bat, golden gun, & more
⭐ Maintain your hunger, stamina, and health just like any other survival game!
⭐ Play the game in High, Medium, Low, and Super low graphics
⭐ Free roam several maps and loot weapons and items during missions
⭐ Login Daily for in-game currency
⭐Offline game allows you to play without internet access

Complete each mission to increase your player rank and earn in-game currency to upgrade your weapons. Each mission lets players roam around various maps for weapons, ammo, food, and medical kits while also completing their mission objective.

Are you ready to protect humanity and fend off hoards of zombies? The zombie outbreak has begun! Show your true valor and start defeating some zombies now!
